com.cloudera.oryx.app.als

Interface Rescorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiRescorer

    public interface Rescorer
    Implementations of this interface can "rescore" the recommender's score for a item that is a candidate for recommendation. It can boost or demote an item given its ID, or filter it out entirely.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isFiltered(String id) 
      double rescore(String id, double originalScore) 

    • Method Detail

      • rescore

        double rescore(String id,
             double originalScore)
        Parameters:
        id - ID of item to rescore
        originalScore - original score from the recommender
        Returns:
        new score; return Double.NaN to exclude the item from recommendation

      • isFiltered

        boolean isFiltered(String id)
        Parameters:
        id - of item to consider for filtering
        Returns:
        true iff the item should be removed from consideration
